title: STUDENTS RESPOND: Is Forgiving Student Debt A Good Thing?

media:group.media:title: STUDENTS RESPOND: Is Forgiving Student Debt A Good Thing?
media:group.media:description:
Biden's student loan debt forgiveness program is set to start this month, so I went to UT campus to ask students how they felt about this plan which will cost taxpayers upwards of 370 billion dollars.

Checkout the full video here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8r5_UBEnEqI&t=21s
